table.name: vtiger_salesorderprojecttasksrel
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesorderprojecttasksrel` ( `salesorderprojecttasksrelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `salesorderprojecttaskname` varchar(100) default NULL, `salesorderid` varchar(100) default NULL, `projectid` varchar(100) default NULL, `status` varchar(100) default NULL, `sequence` varchar(100) default NULL, `starttime` varchar(100) default NULL, `endtime` varchar(100) default NULL, `ownerid` varchar(100) default NULL, `addtime` varchar(100) default NULL, `receivedpaymentsid` varchar(100) default NULL, `schedule` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salesorderprojecttasksrelid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
